AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: farm pig
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made [PAWN_nameDef] part of the pig herd. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped during a prize show, just before [PAWN_pronoun] was awarded first place.
